summary: The module implements a flexible progress‑bar utility that can wrap any iterable to report iteration count, elapsed time, estimated remaining time, and processing rate. It supplies different display back‑ends – an ANSI‑capable terminal display, a simple stream display for non‑ANSI environments, and an HTML renderer for notebook interfaces – and manages the lifecycle of the output stream.
business_intent: Provide real‑time visual feedback on the execution of long‑running simulation loops, enabling users to monitor progress, assess performance, and anticipate completion within command‑line or notebook environments.
